name: GASTRADE SOCIETE ANONYME CONSTRUCTION AND TECHNICAL NATURAL GAS COMPANY
membership: Gastrade is an observer member of GIE : www.gie.eu
goal: Gastrade is the project promoter of the independent natural gas system in Alexandroupolis in north Greece. The project consists of an offshore floating storage and regasification unit and of a pipeline system. The project aims to supply with natural gas the Greek market and the regional market of the SE Europe.
euInitiatives: The project is developed in accordance with the directive 2009/73/EC and the directive 2010/75/EC.
